info.title: Scheme Membership Details
info.description:
# Usage Terms
These interfaces are business-critical interfaces for HMRC and DWP, supporting thousands of staff - all consumption, or change in consumption levels, should be registered and fully approved (see Registered Consumers below).

get.description:
# Purpose
This API is used to retrieve scheme membership details from NPS (National Insurance & PAYE Service). It forms part of the Contracted-Out Pension Processing.
CallbackURL for more processing constructed with the schemeMembershipSequenceNumberQuery, schemeMembershipOccurrenceNumberQuery, and schemeMembershipTransferSequenceNumberQuery.

## Version Log
| Version | Date | Author | Description |
|---------|------|--------|-------------|
| 0.0.1 | 10/12/2025 | NPS Development Team  | Initial Draft  |

schemeMembershipDetails.stateSchemePremiumDeemed: SSP TYPE RECEIVABLES TO BE TREAT AS DEEMED

correlationId.description: Correlation ID - used for traceability purposes - note that this value in the response matches that received in the request to allow correlation.
correlationId.name: correlationId

govUkOriginatorId.description: Identity of the Originating System that made the API call.
govUkOriginatorId.name: gov-uk-originator-id

govUkOrganisationId.description: A unique organisation ID for the user.
govUkOrganisationId.name: gov-uk-organisation-id

govUkUserId.description: A unique user ID for the user.
govUkUserId.name: gov-uk-user-id

govUkUserName.description: A unique username for the user.
govUkUserName.name: gov-uk-user-name

govUkJobRole.description: A unique job role for the user.
govUkJobRole.name: gov-uk-job-role

NationalInsuranceNumber.description: National Insurance Number - unique for an individual - note not all individuals qualify to be issued with one.
NationalInsuranceNumber.name: nino

SchemeMembershipSequenceNumberQuery.description: Unique sequence number representing the position in the scheme membership history (i.e. row) of the scheme membership details entry for this individual - this would only be populated if the previous call did not transfer all of the data i.e. there are more rows marked to be collected still.
SchemeMembershipSequenceNumberQuery.name: seqNo

SchemeMembershipTransferSequenceNumberQu.description: Unique sequence number representing the position in the scheme membership transfer history (i.e. row) of the scheme membership transfer details entry for this individual - this would only be populated if the previous call did not transfer all of the data i.e. there are more rows marked to be collected still.
SchemeMembershipTransferSequenceNumberQu.name: transferSeqNo

SchemeMembershipOccurrenceNumberQuery.description: Denotes the occurrence number for the Scheme Membership.
SchemeMembershipOccurrenceNumberQuery.name: occurrenceNo

correlationId.description: Correlation ID - used for traceability purposes - note that this value in the response matches that received in the request to allow correlation.

govUkOrganisationId.description: A unique organisation ID for the user.

govUkUserId.description: A unique user ID for the user.

govUkUserName.description: A unique username for the user.

govUkJobRole.description: A unique job role for the user.

errorResponse_403.title: Forbidden Error Response

reason.description: Displays the reason of the failure.

reason.description: Displays the reason of the failure.

errorResponse_422.title: Error Response

errorResponseFailure_422.title: Failure Object in Error Response

reason.description: Displays the reason of the failure.

code.description: The error code representing the error that has occurred.

nationalInsuranceNumber.description: National Insurance Number - unique for an individual - note not all individuals qualify to be issued with one.

schemeMembershipSequenceNumber.description: Unique sequence number representing the position in the scheme membership history (i.e. row) of the scheme membership details entry for this individual - this would only be populated if the previous call did not transfer all of the data i.e. there are more rows marked to be collected still.

schemeMembershipTransferSequenceNumber.description: Unique sequence number representing the position in the scheme membership transfer history (i.e. row) of the scheme membership transfer details entry for this individual - this would only be populated if the previous call did not transfer all of the data i.e. there are more rows marked to be collected still.

schemeMembershipOccurrenceNumber.description: Denotes the occurrence number for the Scheme Membership.

callbackURL.description: A URL in the response body that redirects the user to call the next set of data based on the prepared URL. This will only be populated if the call has not returned all the relevant data and another call is required.

GetSchemeMembershipDetailsResponse.description: Success response payload for this API.

RetrieveSchemeMembershipDetails.description: Contains scheme membership and transfer details for an individual.

nationalInsuranceNumber.description: National Insurance Number - unique for an individual - note not all individuals qualify to be issued with one.

schemeMembershipSequenceNumber.description: Unique sequence number representing the position in the scheme membership history (i.e. row) of the scheme membership details entry for this individual - this would only be populated if the previous call did not transfer all of the data i.e. there are more rows marked to be collected still.

schemeMembershipStartDate.description: The start date of the benefit scheme membership.

contractedOutEmployerIdentifier.description: An identifier for a contracted-out employer as part of the contracted-out scheme.

schemeMembershipEndDate.description: The end date of the benefit scheme membership.

methodOfPreservationType.description: Denotes the method of preservation used to indicate the method by which an individual's occupational/personal pension rights are to be protected.

totalLinkedGuaranteedMinimumPensionContr.description: Denotes the Guaranteed Minimum Pension / Contracted-Out Deduction value accrued from linked memberships of one or more schemes and transfers.

accruedPensionContractedOutDeductionsVal.description: The value of the Guaranteed Minimum Pension (GMP) / Contracted-Out Deductions (COD) that has been accrued.

totalLinkedGuaranteedMinimumPensionContr.description: Denotes the Guaranteed Minimum Pension / Contracted-Out Deduction value accrued from linked memberships of one or more schemes and transfers.

accruedPensionContractedOutDeductionsVal.description: The value of the Guaranteed Minimum Pension (GMP) / Contracted-Out Deductions (COD) that has been accrued post 1988.

revaluationRate.description: Denotes the rate of revaluation for the benefit scheme.

guaranteedMinimumPensionReconciliationSt.description: Denotes whether the reconciliation check action has been taken in respect of the scheme membership and if so, what the outcome of the reconciliation check was.

employeesReference.description: Denotes the reference number that is associated with the employee's benefit scheme membership.

finalYearEarnings.description: The final amount of earnings for the year for the guaranteed minimum pension calculation.

penultimateYearEarnings.description: The penultimate year's earnings amount used for guaranteed minimum pension calculations.

retrospectiveEarnings.description: The total amount of retrospective monetary earnings that a taxpayer may be required to pay tax on, for a given tax period.

furtherPaymentsConfirmation.description: Denotes whether or not further payments are allowed under the scheme membership when scheme membership has ceased.

survivorStatus.description: Denotes the scheme membership status for a surviving partner.

transferPremiumElectionDate.description: The date a Transfer Premium is elected to be paid.

revaluationApplied.description: Denotes if a revaluation percentage has been applied to the benefit scheme membership.

stateEarningsRelatedPensionsSchemeNonRes.description: Denotes the non-restoration value of the State Earnings Related Pensions Scheme (SERPS).

stateEarningsRelatedPensionsSchemeValueP.description: Denotes the value of the State Earnings Related Pensions Scheme (SERPS) post 1988.

apparentUnnotifiedTerminationStatus.description: Denotes the status of an Apparent Unnotified Termination (AUT).

terminationMicrofilmNumber.description: Denotes the microfilm number associated with the termination of this benefit scheme.

debitVoucherMicrofilmNumber.description: Denotes the microfilm number linked to the debit voucher of the benefit scheme.

creationMicrofilmNumber.description: Denotes the microfilm number linked to the creation of the benefit scheme.

inhibitSchemeProcessing.description: Denotes whether or not to inhibit processing associated with a benefit scheme.

extensionDate.description: The date that the original time limit period has been extended to.

guaranteedMinimumPensionContractedOutDed.description: Denotes the value of the Guaranteed Minimum Pension (GMP) / Contracted-Out Deductions (COD) after being revalued.

clericalCalculationInvolved.description: Denotes whether or not the termination has been subjected to a clerical calculation.

clericallyControlledTotal.description: Denotes the total weekly Guaranteed Minimum Pension (GMP) / Contracted-Out Deductions (COD) payable at state pension age which has been subjected to clerical revaluation.

clericallyControlledTotalPost1988.description: Denotes the total weekly Guaranteed Minimum Pension (GMP) / Contracted-Out Deductions (COD) payable at state pension age which has been subjected to clerical revaluation post 1988.

certifiedAmount.description: Denotes the amount of money an employer can reclaim from an employee who is paying a contribution equivalent premium to restore rights back to the state scheme.

enforcementStatus.description: Denotes what Guaranteed Minimum Pension (GMP) has been enforced and what future action is permissible if enforcement has taken place.

stateSchemePremiumDeemed.description: Denotes whether or not any State Scheme Premium (SSP) related receivables linked to the scheme membership should be treated as deemed.

transferTakeUpDate.description: The date on which the customer's membership in the benefits scheme started, following a transfer.

schemeMembershipOccurrenceNumber.description: Denotes the occurrence number for the Scheme Membership.

schemeMembershipTransferSequenceNumber.description: Unique sequence number representing the position in the scheme membership transfer history (i.e. row) of the scheme membership transfer details entry for this individual - this would only be populated if the previous call did not transfer all of the data i.e. there are more rows marked to be collected still.

contributionCategoryFinalYear.description: Denotes the contribution category under which Class 1 National Insurance Contributions were paid in the final year of benefit scheme membership.

contributionCategoryPenultimateYear.description: Denotes the contribution category under which Class 1 National Insurance Contributions were paid in the penultimate year of benefit scheme membership.

contributionCategoryRetrospectiveYear.description: Denotes the contribution category under which Class 1 National Insurance Contributions were paid in a retrospective year of benefit scheme membership.

protectedRightsStartDate.description: The date that an individual's rights are protected from, with regards to scheme membership.

schemeMembershipDebitReason.description: Denotes the reason as to why a scheme membership holds a debit.

technicalAmount.description: The amount of money required to fully buy back a scheme member's additional pension rights in the event of scheme cessation.

minimumFundTransferAmount.description: Denotes the minimum funding amount required to qualify for transferring to the Contracted-Out Salary Related (COSR) schemes.

actualTransferValue.description: The amount of money that was actually transferred.

schemeSuspensionType.description: Denotes the type of suspension applied to a scheme.

guaranteedMinimumPensionConversionApplie.description: Denotes whether or not the Guaranteed Minimum Pension (GMP) conversion has been applied.

employersContractedOutNumberDetails.description: Denotes the Employer's Contracting-Out Number with prefix and suffix - used where an employer has an occupational pension scheme that is contracted-out of the State Second Pension.

schemeCreatingContractedOutNumberDetails.description: Denotes the Benefit Scheme's Contracted-Out Number with prefix and suffix for the scheme being created.

schemeTerminatingContractedOutNumberDeta.description: Denotes the Terminating Benefit Scheme's Contracted-Out Number with prefix and suffix.

importingAppropriateSchemeNumberDetails.description: Denotes the importing ASN (Appropriate Scheme Number) / SCON (Scheme Contracted-Out Number) with prefix and suffix.

apparentUnnotifiedTerminationDestination.description: Denotes the Scheme Contracted-Out Number (SCON) with prefix and suffix that falls under Apparent Unnotified Termination (AUT).

SchemeMembershipDetailsSummary.description: Contains scheme membership details for an individual, including their stakeholder pension status.

stakeholderPensionSchemeType.description: Denotes the type of stakeholder pension scheme.
